# Bug Report Template

**Suggested Labels:** `bug`, `priority:*`, `size:*`

```markdown
## Description
<!-- Clear description of the bug -->

## Steps to Reproduce
1. <!-- Step 1 -->
2. <!-- Step 2 -->
3. <!-- Step 3 -->

## Expected Behavior
<!-- What should happen -->

## Actual Behavior
<!-- What actually happens -->

## Environment
- **OS:** <!-- e.g., Windows 11, macOS 14, Ubuntu 22.04 -->
- **Version:** <!-- App/package version -->
- **Browser:** <!-- If applicable -->

## Screenshots/Logs
<!-- Include error messages, screenshots, or log output -->

## Possible Cause
<!-- Optional: If you have any idea what might be causing this -->
```
